Name: Binary Trigger
About the game: VR GAME: YOU NEED AN HTC VIVE OR COMPATIBLE DEVICE TO PLAY THIS GAME Binary Trigger is a virtual reality precision wave shooter, with an emphasis on accuracy and speed. Competing for the highest score is the focus of the game, and you'll have to be quick and sharp if you want to keep your score multipliers high. Features Old-school arcade action Global and Friends Leaderboards Bonus, Challenge and Boss waves
